text_logic_form: The length of the line $FD$ is $3x - 7$ units.
The length of the line $EG$ is $x + 5$ units.
Find the length of the line $EG$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $FD$ is $3x - 7$ units.
The length of the line $EG$ is $x + 5$ units.
Find the length of the line $EG$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $E$ and $G$.
Point $A$ also lies on the line connecting $D$ and $F$.
The line $DG$ is perpendicular to the line $GF$.
